#include <iostream>
#include <vector>

using namespace std;

int main(){
  int t,n;
  cin >> t;
  while(t--){
    cin >> n;
    int begin = 1;
    while(1){
      if (n == 2){
        cout << "15" <<endl;
        break;
      }
      vector<long long> values(n+1);
      values[0] = begin;
      int i;

      for(i = 0; i< n ; i++){
        if((values[i] * n) % (n-1) == 0)
          values[i+1] = (values[i] * n)/(n-1) + 1;      
        else if(values[i+1] < 6)
          break;
        else
          break;
      }
      if( i == n ){
        cout << values[n] << endl;
        break;
      }
      begin += n;
    }
  }
  return 0;
}
